response.answer_text: It is funny that you should ask, I remember the song “Hurt” when I was a young boy back in the 60″s and it was sung by Timmy Yuro. I never forgot the song and it to me 40 years to find it. I am not sure if there are remakes of the song but I haven’t heard of any. Timi Yuro - Wikipediahttps://Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia/wiki/Timi_YuroRosemary Timothy Yuro (August 4, 1940 – March 30, 2004), professionally known as Timi Yuro, was an American singer and songwriter.Sometimes called "the little girl with the big voice," she is considered to be one of the first blue-eyed soul stylists of the rock era.
